title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Multimedia-Based Training Program for Improving Speech Analysis Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish the appeal, expression, and representation functions of speech in diverse social contexts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can correct three error types—functional misunderstanding, context neglect, and expression distortion—by comparing their speech analysis with expert models, achieving over 70% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate the ability to analyze speech functions in real-time conversational contexts, evidenced by two or more successful cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
